TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_SEQ_01<tab>Chora-Zoi regards you with a glimmer of ambition in her eyes─she is eager to report that one more spark of potential lies dormant within your splendorous tool. Marking this discovery as the sign of a master smithy, Grenoldt is confident that Chora-Zoi will perfect the tools they have striven to complete, and the latter bids you aid them one final time to collect the trade goods they require.
※Please note that you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_SEQ_02<tab>With the last batch of components and your tool in hand, Chora-Zoi rushes to the forge with Grenoldt. In moments, she presents to you the culmination of your combined efforts─a true beacon of hope that shines like a guiding star as you hold it up towards the skies. Though Chora-Zoi is disheartened at the thought of your splendorous endeavors coming to an end, Grenoldt reassures her that there is still much to be done for the Boutique, and the two resolve to continue their collaborative works that they might share their prosperity with all of Norvrandt.

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>Please note that upon completing the quest “Stand Tool, My Friend,” you will receive an upgraded splendorous tool for your current class of <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>.
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_A1_000_001<tab>Undertake this quest as another class.

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_A1_000_002<tab>Undertake this quest as <var 08 E4E9450B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9450F ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94506 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9451B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94522 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((a <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>Be advised that once you undertake this quest, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted it.
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_SYSTEM_000_002<tab>Please ensure that you have changed to your desired class before speaking with Chora-Zoi.
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_SYSTEM_000_003<tab>In order to receive the quest “Stand Tool, My Friend” you must have <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> equipped, in your Armoury Chest, or in your inventory.
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_SYSTEM_000_004<tab>You have already received <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var>. Please change to a different class and speak to Chora-Zoi again.

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_005<tab>How are you enjoying the new tool, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? It's an impressive piece, if I do say so myself! To think my own hands could forge something that might potentially revolutionize our work... It's exhilarating, really!

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_006<tab>I won't deny it took a great deal of effort to reach this point, and we should be proud of how far we've come... But after reflecting on our progress thus far, I believe there may be a way to improve your tool one final time!
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_GRENOLDT_000_007<tab>Hah! Figured it out, did ye? At this rate, I reckon ye won't need much guidance.
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_GRENOLDT_000_008<tab>I've taught ye all I know, Miss Chora-Zoi... Ye've become a true master o' the craft, an' I'm certain ye'll guide us to unfathomable heights!
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_009<tab>I will, Master Grenoldt! Just you watch!
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_010<tab>What do you say, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Keen to aid us on our final splendorous endeavor?
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_011<tab>Looking to add that final spark of inspiration to another splendorous tool? Well, I won't say no to that!

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_012<tab>To complete this tool, we'll need─yes, you guessed it─the finest components that Mistress Qeshi-Trao can provide. Specifically, <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8020302 /var>!

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_013<tab>And if we're to obtain those components, we'll need you to craft the finest trade goods Norvrandt has to offer. A shipment of <var 08 E4E80202 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 04F2A12E0302 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80203 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 04F2A12F0302 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80204 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 04F2A1300302 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80205 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 04F2A1310302 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80206 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 04F2A1320302 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80207 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 04F2A1330302 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80208 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 04F2A1340302 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80209 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 04F2A1350302 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var> should be enough to satisfy the Boutique!

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_014<tab>To complete this tool, we'll need─yes, you guessed it─the finest components that Mistress Qeshi-Trao can provide. Specifically, <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8020302 /var> and <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8030302 /var>!

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_015<tab>And if we're to obtain those components, we'll need you to gather the finest trade goods Norvrandt has to offer. A shipment of <var 08 E4E8020A ((<var 31 ((Item)) 04F2A14A0302 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8020B ((<var 31 ((Item)) 04F2A14C0302 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> should be enough to satisfy the Boutique!

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_016<tab>To complete this tool, we'll need─yes, you guessed it─the finest components Qeshi-Trao and the Boutique can provide. Specifically, <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8020302 /var>!

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_017<tab>And if we're to obtain those components, we'll need you to haul up the finest fish Norvrandt has to offer. A shipment of <var 31 ((Item)) 04F2A1540302 /var> or <var 31 ((Item)) 04F2A1550302 /var> should be enough to satisfy the Boutique!

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_018<tab>As a reminder, aetherial reduction is always an option while you're out procuring trade goods! Your aetherially reduced components are equally valuable to the project.

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_019<tab>Last but not least, do remember to keep that splendorous tool in hand as you work! This final step will require a good deal of fine-tuning, and we'll want to observe how the tool reacts to prolonged use.

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_020<tab>You can deliver your wares straight to Quinnana, and she'll provide us the components we seek from her usual stock. Any questions? Please direct them to Master Grenoldt!

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_021<tab>Your tool has been on quite the journey, and it would be my honor to upgrade it one last time. Simply hand it over with the required components when you're ready, and we'll be on our way to perfection!
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>Present Chora-Zoi with your Vrandtic visionary's tool and the requisite materials to receive an upgraded version.
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_SYSTEM_000_023<tab>Nightforged components can be obtained by delivering selected trade goods to Quinnana at Grenoldt's workbench near the Crystalline Mean.
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_SYSTEM_000_024<tab>Gatherers may also obtain nightforged components by using aetherial reduction on the applicable trade goods.
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_SYSTEM_000_025<tab>In order to use aetherial reduction, you must first complete the quest “No Longer a Collectable.”

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_SYSTEM_000_026<tab>To craft the necessary trade goods, open the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Crafting Log<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Special Recipes<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from within the requisite crafting discipline. Next, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Sidequests<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, then lastly <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Splendorous Tools<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to locate applicable recipes.
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_SYSTEM_000_027<tab>Please note that select crafting materials can be purchased with scrips, and that you must have your Vrandtic visionary's tool equipped when crafting.

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_SYSTEM_000_028<tab>The trade goods in question can be found in the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Splendorous Tools<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> section of the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Gathering Log<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_SYSTEM_000_029<tab>Please note that you must have your Vrandtic visionary's tool equipped when gathering.
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>Catching fish suitable for trade goods requires the use of specialized bait balls. This bait can be obtained from Quinnana in exchange for scrips.
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>Please note that you must have your Vrandtic visionary's tool equipped when fishing.
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_SYSTEM_000_032<tab>Furthermore, if an applicable fish is caught with Fisher's Intuition, it will yield more components than usual.
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_SYSTEM_000_033<tab>When making your final delivery to Chora-Zoi, the tool to be upgraded should be placed in your inventory or Armoury Chest, and not equipped.
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_GRENOLDT_000_034<tab>Summat confusin' ye? Just make sure to use yer Vrandtic visionary's tool to prepare the trade goods for barter.

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_GRENOLDT_000_035<tab>Deliver said goods to Quinnana, an' she'll exchange them for the rare materials we need. Once ye've got enough, drop the lot on Chora-Zoi so's she can get on with the improvements. Simple, eh?
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_SYSTEM_000_036<tab>Present Chora-Zoi with your Vrandtic visionary's tool and the requisite materials to receive an upgraded version.

Next, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Sidequests<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, then lastly <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Splendorous Tools<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to locate applicable recipes.
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_SYSTEM_000_039<tab>Please note that the selected crafting materials can be purchased with scrips, and that you must have your Vrandtic visionary's tool equipped when crafting.

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>The trade goods in question can be found in the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Splendorous Tools<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> section of the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Gathering Log<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_SYSTEM_000_044<tab>Furthermore, if an applicable fish is caught with Fisher's Intuition, it will yield more components than usual.
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_SYSTEM_000_045<tab>When making your final delivery to Chora-Zoi, the tool to be upgraded should be placed in your inventory or Armoury Chest, and not equipped.
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_050<tab>Outstanding work, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! No mountain of components is too high for you to conquer!
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_051<tab>Now, I imagine that's all quite heavy, so if you could pass those along with your tool...
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_052<tab>Many thanks! I...I suppose this is it, then. One last, glorious step towards Mistress Mowen's beacon of hope─and my final collaboration with Master Grenoldt.

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_053<tab>Bittersweet, isn't it? We've had such a wonderful time together...but all good things must come to an end. This tool is our greatest achievement, and I mean to utilize every lesson I've learned to ensure it remains that way.

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_054<tab>Let's see... Everything appears to be in order! I've had the fires ready to forge at a moment's notice, so sit tight and we'll have the finishing touches completed in no time.

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_055<tab><pant> <pant> ...Our tool must embody perfection. It must define us and inspire us─as artisans and providers, masters and apprentices─it must allow us to reach for the very stars and take hold of new opportunities!

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_056<tab>It must be everything we've ever been proud of. Every splendorous kettle, every crystalline rarity and brilliant friendship and visionary word... This is the epitome of our struggles and our triumphs. This is who we are!

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_057<tab>Now for the final coat of oil... To those who have taught me, and to those who I might one day teach in return, let this serve as our lodestar─our eternal guide through the night!
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_058<tab>Finally... It's really, truly complete! This tool is everything we've ever dreamed of and so much more!

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_GRENOLDT_000_059<tab>Aye, the gods themselves would envy a tool like this! Go on then, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Yer about to hold a piece o' history, so raise it up for the world to see!
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_060<tab>Ahem! Allow me to present <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var>, our collaborative magnum opus!

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_061<tab>I can't think of anyone more fit to use it than you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You've been a cornerstone of this endeavor from the very first, so I hope you'll accept this tool not only as a product of our hard work, but as a token of our boundless gratitude!
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_062<tab>And with that, our project has reached completion. We've accomplished so much... I can't begin to express how thankful I am for this opportunity.
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_GRENOLDT_000_063<tab>Ye made us all proud, Miss Chora-Zoi...an' don't ye ever go forgettin' how ye feel in this moment. Ye've earned every bit o' the glory.
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_GRENOLDT_000_064<tab>That immaculate tool sittin' in <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s hands is proof o' yer unflaggin' dedication to yer craft.

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_GRENOLDT_000_065<tab>Workin' with the two of ye was an experience worth more'n me finest kettle, an' I wouldn't trade it for the bleedin' world. I s'pose after all this time, that's what I truly craved from the process─to share me greatest accomplishments with someone who ain't a sea slug.
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_066<tab>What will you do after we present this tool to Mistress Mowen? Y-You're not planning on leaving the Crystarium again, are you!?

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_GRENOLDT_000_067<tab>Hah! Ye don't need to worry yerself about that... The finished tool may mark the end o' the enhancement process, but we've still got plenty o' work ahead of us.

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_GRENOLDT_000_068<tab>We can't very well turn the trades on their heads if we don't make summat to share with the Boutique, now, can we? That, lass, is bound to be a whole new journey unto itself!

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_GRENOLDT_000_070<tab>An' on that journey, I'll need more'n just a quiet place to hone me skills─I'll need somewhere I can share me ideas, an' a colleague to help me develop 'em. I can think o' no better smitty to work with than you, Miss Chora-Zoi.
TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_071<tab><sob> Y-You're the best mentor I could've asked for, Master Grenoldt...!

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_080<tab>Another masterwork complete! I'm proud to present you with your finished tool, <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var>! Now, I think you know what comes next─hold it up for all to see!

TEXT_AKTKCT303_04804_CHORAZOI_000_081<tab>Words can't express how grateful we are for your efforts, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...but I hope this tool conveys the message just as well! And if you need a hand with any of your other tools, you know where to find us!
